spiritsExplanation:
The workout's title "Restorative Yoga" and description "Gently move and spend time in each pose" strongly indicate a relaxing and healing focus, matching the 'Soothing & Restorative' spirit. The score of 0.95 reflects the explicit emphasis on restorative and gentle movement.

The setting in "Lucerne, Switzerland" alongside the depiction of an outdoor environment by the lake suggests a connection with nature. This aligns with the 'Outdoor & Adventure' spirit, scoring 0.75 due to the session being conducted outdoors in a scenic location.

The mentioned music genre "Chill low, Cool/Downtempo" supports a calming atmosphere, further reinforcing the Soothing & Restorative spirit. Lack of equipment and a short 16-minute duration also align with a light and restorative workout. Other spirits such as 'High-Energy & Intense' or 'Structured & Disciplined' do not fit due to the gentle, relaxed focus and setting.
